m:MaterialTitle.title: Usage
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using MaterialIcon Widget you can easily make it by adding the lines below. Just set the icon attribute and indicate which icon you want to display. Please refer below about the list of icon.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Sizes
m:MaterialTitle.description: To control the size of the icon, just set size attribute in your MaterialIcon widget.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="POLYMER" iconSize="TINY" />
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="POLYMER" iconSize="SMALL" />
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="POLYMER" iconSize="MEDIUM" />
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="POLYMER" iconSize="LARGE" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: Icon inside MaterialLink
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can add in your material link an icon instance by adding icon attribute

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre: <m:MaterialLink fontSize="2em" text="I love Material Design" textColor="red" iconType="FAVORITE" iconPosition="LEFT" />
